title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1473/89 of 26 May 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4141/87 determining the conditions under which goods for certain categories of aircraft and ships are eligible on import for a favourable tariff arrangement by reason of their end-use
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1473/89
of 26 May 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 4141/87 determining the conditions under which goods for certain categories of aircraft and ships are eligible on import for a favourable tariff arrangement by reason of their end-use
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 May 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
